I look at my collection of mermaid books and imagine swimming with them.

content.text: Hey there!  It's a rainy day here, so I'm thinking of staying inside and playing guitar.
Hey! That sounds like a great way to spend the day. I'm actually doing some work on my salt water aquarium.
Oh, that's cool! I love to look at those. Have you ever seen a real mermaid?
No, I haven't! But I'd love to. I love reading mermaid books and imagining what it would be like to swim with them.
Me too! I think they're so beautiful. What do you blog about?
I blog about salt water aquarium ownership. I love sharing my experiences and tips with other hobbyists.
That's really cool! I've always wanted to have a salt water aquarium, but I'm not sure I have the time or the money to keep it up.
It can be a lot of work, but it's also very rewarding. I love watching my fish swim around and interact with each other.
I bet it is! I've always been fascinated by marine life.
Me too! It's so amazing to think about all the different creatures that live in the ocean.
Yeah, it is! I love watching documentaries about them.
Me too! I could watch them for hours.
Me too! They're so interesting.
I think they're the coolest creatures on earth.
Me too! I wish I could spend more time learning about them.
Me too! It's so interesting.
I think I'm going to go check out your blog.
Awesome! I hope you enjoy it.
I'm sure I will!
Great! Let me know what you think.
Will do!
